ProductInfo.Features:
24.1 megapixed DX-format image sensor
Shoot up to 6 frames per second for up to 100 continuous shots
Wireless sharing and control with WU-1a adapter (not included)
ISO range from 100 to 6400
1080p videos with full-time autofocus and built-in stereo mic
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D7100 DSLR Camera Kit with Nikon 18-105mm DX VR Lens + Nikon AF-S NIKKOR 55-300mm f/4.5-5.6G ED VR Zoom Lens + CS Kit: Includes 32GB SDHC Memory Card, SD Card Reader, Nikon ENEL15 Replacement Battery, Rapid Travel Charger, 3 Piece Filter Kit, High Definition Wide Angle Lens, 2x Telephoto HD Lens, Carrying Case, Cleaning Pen, Starters Kit & CS Microfiber Cleaning Cloth
